text: is a town in Fukushima, Japan. It is in the Futaba District and is close to Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. The Fukushima Daini Nuclear Power Plant Reactors 1-4 are in the town. After the March 11 disaster, the town offices moved to Iwaki, Fukushima. On 25 March 2011, the offices moved again to Aizumisato, Fukushima ==Other websites== Category:Towns in Fukushima Prefecture
title: Naraha, Fukushima
